distractors_added.location: updateRequiredSignatures() function directly changing required and emitting configuration events, plus previewExecution() external view helper performing low-level staticcall
_updateConfiguration() internal function and walletActivityScore, configurationVersion, lastUpdateTimestamp fields handling configuration-related scoring and metadata
_recordActivity() internal function and ownerActionCount mapping updating per-owner activity and emitting WalletActivity events
getOwners() and getWalletStats() view functions exposing derived statistics unrelated to authorization checks

actual_vulnerability.location: initWallet() and kill() functions in WalletLibrary, which remain callable on the library contract itself

notes: Trojan Horse transformation adds configuration tuning functions, execution preview helpers, and wallet activity metrics around the existing multi-signature wallet logic while leaving the core behavior of initialization and destruction unchanged.
